name: save_restore_with_attrs
description: ESC 7 / ESC 8 (DECSC/DECRC) saves and restores cursor position and SGR attributes
comment: SGR 1 (bold on), print A at (0,0). ESC 7 saves cursor at (0,1) with bold. SGR 0 resets. CUP(3,1) to (2,0), print BC. ESC 8 restores cursor to (0,1) with bold. Print D at (0,1) with bold.
